findings.title: Removal Of Unused Variables And Code
findings.description: Unused code or unnecessary redundancies can be safely removed from multiple contracts, such as Tier2FarmController.

findings.title: Incompatibility with Deflationary/Rebasing Tokens
findings.description: The `Core` contract's deposit function is incompatible with deflationary/rebasing tokens, which could have a control switch to turn them into deflationary tokens.
